title: new zac skin
body: ok so zac has been out for a while and i think a skin for him is needed and im just thinking pool party zac or gentleman zac or one to fit in a theme i  would really just like to see it happen thanks!

replies.body: Zac's model is boring, and he's underplayed, no.

I want to see 'Trucker Zac'.

It's just Zac but he's wearing a trucker hat and a red checkered flannel shirt.
